title: "How can mastering consciousness allow us to control our body, breath, and thoughts?"
first_phrase: In this final part, the concept of the interconnectedness of all things is further explored by testing the power of the mind over solid and liquid matter. The author emphasizes how consciousness commands the elements and how humans hold within them the divine consciousness that maintains and recreates existence every moment. Through mental focus and control, one can achieve independence from external impressions and pain. The text ends by asking the reader to relax, stop breathing, and restart at will.
content: La coscienza comanda gli elementi Ora lo proverò col solido e col liquido. Sedetevi e state fermi. RIMANETE ASSOLUTAMENTE IMMOBILI. Apri gli occhi. Mentre il braccio si alza e lo osservate rendetevi conto della rigidezza in lui Rimanete immobili mezzo minuto. A questo punto dite mentalmente : “il braccio deve cadere abbandonato”. Ed a questo punto il braccio destro cade abbandonato. Ora vi ubbidiscono le materie liquide e solide. A questo punto tutto diventa immobile in voi, tranne il respiro. Gli occhi restano aperti. last_phrase: In conclusion, mastering the control over solid, liquid, and air elements, along with the ability to regulate your breathing and thoughts, offers a way to become independent of external influences and pain. With practice, you can develop the power to command your body and mind, leading to a more relaxed and peaceful state of being.
